metadata.name: Meta Meerkat Club Male #1
metadata.description: Believed to only live in Africa - there have been sightings of Meerkats taking over the Ethereum Blockchain! Meta Meerkat Club is a collection of 10,011 escapee meerkat NFT's living on the Ethereum blockchain. Owning Meta Meerkats grants access to member-only benefits and voting. We strive to be a community lead project where all decisions will be up to the community for the community.
